acolyte.flavor: Devotion and discipline strengthen your spiritual resolve.

adept.flavor: Growing mastery sharpens your arcane instincts.

alchemist.flavor: Chemical mastery enhances your potions and extracts.

apocalypse.flavor: Cataclysmic power surges through you, overwhelming but unstable.

apprentice.flavor: Early magical training grants a faint spark of potential.

archer.flavor: Precision and patience enhance your ranged attacks.

artificer.flavor: Arcane engineering improves your enchanted creations.

assassin.flavor: Deadly precision and swift execution define your strikes.

berserker.flavor: Rage fuels your blows, trading defense for overwhelming force.

blacksmith.flavor: Metalworking expertise strengthens your forged goods.

bozo.flavor: Chaotic antics unpredictably shift the flow of battle.

carpenter.flavor: Woodcraft skill improves your structural creations.

chef.flavor: Culinary mastery enhances the potency of your meals.

cleric.flavor: Divine conviction bolsters both offense and protection.

corrupted.flavor: Twisted energies empower your strikes at a subtle cost.

druid.flavor: Nature’s harmony strengthens your body and spirit.

fisherman.flavor: Aquatic knowledge improves your fishing results.

guardian.flavor: Unyielding defense and discipline fortify your stance.

healer.flavor: Compassion and focus enhance your restorative abilities.

herbalist.flavor: Botanical expertise enhances your herb gathering.

leatherworker.flavor: Hidecraft skill improves your leather goods.

mage.flavor: Arcane study amplifies your destructive potential.

miner.flavor: Stone sense and precision improve your mining yields.

monk.flavor: Balance and discipline refine your martial technique.

necromancer.flavor: Mastery of decay empowers your dark arts.

paladin.flavor: Holy conviction strengthens both blade and shield.

ranger.flavor: Survival instincts sharpen your aim and awareness.

ritualist.flavor: Ceremonial focus strengthens your ritual outcomes.

rogue.flavor: Cunning and agility enhance your opportunistic strikes.

rot.flavor: Decay clings to you, weakening the body but empowering corruption.

shaman.flavor: Elemental spirits guide your strikes and spells.

spelunker.flavor: Deep‑cave instincts enhance your subterranean discoveries.

thief.flavor: Speed and subtlety enhance your precision attacks.

tinkerer.flavor: Mechanical ingenuity enhances your gadgets, tools, and automated creations.

trainee.flavor: Basic training grants only the faintest edge.

trickster.flavor: Misdirection and flair amplify your unpredictable style.

void.flavor: The emptiness between worlds fuels your power at a cost.

warlock.flavor: Dark pacts enhance your destructive magic.

warrior.flavor: Strength and discipline sharpen your combat prowess.

weaver.flavor: Threadwork mastery improves your textile quality.

witch.flavor: Hexcraft and cunning empower your eerie magic.
